name: Cashews
properties: Part of Daily Dozen nuts and seeds
Best consumed whole rather than as butter
benefits: Cashews are nutrient-dense nuts that provide healthy fats, protein, and fiber. When soaked and blended, they create creamy, cheese-like sauces without added fats. As part of the Daily Dozen nuts and seeds category, they contribute to the ideal weight-loss diet.
amount: Part of 1 serving nuts/seeds daily (1/4 cup or 1 ounce), or 3/4 cup raw for cheese sauces

quotes: NUTS AND SEEDS checkbox in Daily Dozen. CHEESY BROCCOLI SOUP - 3/4 cup/115g raw cashews, soaked in boiling water for 30 minutes and then drained, combined with nutritional yeast to create cheesy flavor.
